mapper.select: SELECT * FROM alert a JOIN alertSetting s ON a.userno = s.userno WHERE a.userno = #{param1} and isread = '0' AND ( (a.category = 'like' AND s.like = '1') OR (a.category = 'comment' AND s.comment = '1') OR (a.category = 'notice' AND s.notice = '1') OR (a.category = 'calendar' AND s.calendar = '1') );
mapper.update: UPDATE alert SET isread = 1 WHERE alertid = #{param1};
